name: AppCenterTest
description: Test app packages with Visual Studio App Center.
helpMarkDown: For help with this task, visit the Visual Studio App Center [support site](https://aka.ms/appcentersupport).
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: app
inputs.label: Binary Application File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the APK or IPA file you want to test.

inputs.name: artifactsDir
inputs.label: Artifacts Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Where to place the artifacts produced by the prepare step and used by the run step. This directory will be created if it does not exist.

inputs.name: appiumBuildDir
inputs.label: Build Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to directory with Appium tests.

inputs.name: espressoBuildDir
inputs.label: Build Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to Espresso output directory.

inputs.name: espressoTestApkPath
inputs.label: Test APK Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to APK file with Espresso tests. If not set, build-dir is used to discover it. Wildcard is allowed.

inputs.name: calabashProjectDir
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to Calabash workspace directory.

inputs.name: calabashConfigFile
inputs.label: Cucumber Config File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to Cucumber configuration file, usually cucumber.yml.

inputs.name: calabashProfile
inputs.label: Profile to run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Profile to run.  This value must exists in the Cucumber configuration file.

inputs.name: calabashSkipConfigCheck
inputs.label: Skip Configuration Check
inputs.helpMarkDown: Force running without Cucumber profile.

inputs.name: uitestBuildDir
inputs.label: Build Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to directory with built test assemblies.

inputs.name: uitestToolsDir
inputs.label: Test Tools Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to directory with Xamarin UI test tools that contains test-cloud.exe.

inputs.name: publishNUnitResults
inputs.label: Publish NUnit Test Results
inputs.helpMarkDown: When selected, --nunit-xml option will be passed to the appcenter-cli. Results from the NUnit xml file will be published to TFS/Team Services.

inputs.name: signInfo
inputs.label: Signing Information
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use Signing Infor for signing the test server.

inputs.name: xcuitestBuildDir
inputs.label: Build Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the build output directory (usually $(ProjectDir)/Build/Products/Debug-iphoneos).

inputs.name: xcuitestTestIpaPath
inputs.label: Test IPA Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the *.ipa file with the XCUITest tests.

inputs.name: prepareOpts
inputs.label: Additional Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments passed to appcenter test prepare step.

inputs.name: credsType
inputs.label: Authentication Method
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use App Center service endpoint connection or enter credentials to connect to Visual Studio App Center.

inputs.name: serverEndpoint
inputs.label: App Center Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service endpoint for your Visual Studio App Center connection. To create one, click the Manage link and create a new service endpoint.

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: App Center Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Visit https://appcenter.ms/settings/profile to get your username.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: App Center Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Visit https://appcenter.ms/settings/profile to set your password. It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'. You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: appSlug
inputs.label: App Slug
inputs.helpMarkDown: The app slug is in the format of {username}/{app_identifier}.  To locate {username} and {app_identifier} for an app, click on its name from https://appcenter.ms/apps, and the resulting url is in the format of https://appcenter.ms/users/{username}/apps/{app_identifier}.

inputs.name: devices
inputs.label: Devices
inputs.helpMarkDown: String to identify what devices this test will run against.  Copy and paste this string when you define a new test run from App Center Test beacon.

inputs.name: series
inputs.label: Test Series
inputs.helpMarkDown: The series name for organizing test runs (e.g. master, production, beta).

inputs.name: dsymDir
inputs.label: dSYM Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to iOS symbol files.

inputs.name: locale
inputs.label: System Language
inputs.helpMarkDown: If your language isn't displayed, select 'Other' and enter its locale below, such as en_US.

inputs.name: userDefinedLocale
inputs.label: Other Locale
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter any two-letter ISO-639 language code along with any two-letter ISO 3166 country code in the format [language]_[country], such as en_US.

inputs.name: loginOpts
inputs.label: Addtional Options for Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments passed to appcenter login step.

inputs.name: runOpts
inputs.label: Additional Options for Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments passed to appcenter test run.

inputs.name: async
inputs.label: Do not wait for test result
inputs.helpMarkDown: Execute command asynchronously, exit when tests are uploaded, without waiting for test results.

inputs.name: cliLocationOverride
inputs.label: appcenter CLI Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to appcenter CLI on the build or release agent.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.label: Enable Debug Output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add --debug to appcenter cli.

instanceNameFormat: Test with Visual Studio App Center

messages.Succeeded: Visual Studio App Center Test task succeeded.
messages.CannotLocateAppCenterCLI: Could not find appcenter cli, install appcenter-cli from npm first.
messages.CannotFindAnyFile: Cannot find any file based on %s.
